metadata.name: 1.03.EP
metadata.description:
Here you find a small series of works which are not digital born but digitized from physical drawings of an artist who lived in Leverkusen and Brussels where he died in 2015. The artwork is exclusive, rare and not reproducible.

The first owner of this piece has the exclusive opportunity to acquire the original artwork additionally.

We welcome all of you to become friends of this meaningful NFT and engage in a society loving art and caring about it. Discover, enjoy, use!
